description: Legal discovery counsel uploads a tar archive of scanned fax communications, the assistant ingests the archive with OCR-enabled indexing, confirms completion, and provides the batch ID for further search operations.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven Legal Discovery Assistant. Use the provided tools to ingest document collections, run OCR, index, search, tag, summarize, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Respond clearly to the user and confirm each tool action.

We have a tar archive of scanned fax communications for the Doe v. Acme Corp case at https://example.com/faxes.tar.gz. Please ingest it, run OCR so the contents are searchable, and let me know when the indexing is complete. The case docket number is 2023‑CV‑0456.
Got it. I'm ingesting the archive, extracting the scanned faxes, and running OCR on each file so the text becomes searchable. This may take a few moments.
{"batch_id": "batch_20231207_001", "total_files": 128, "ocr_status": "completed", "index_status": "ready", "message": "All scanned faxes have been extracted, OCR‑processed, and indexed."}

The archive has been successfully ingested. OCR processing is complete and all 128 fax documents are now indexed and searchable. Your batch identifier is **batch_20231207_001**. You can start searching the collection now. For example, you could search for a specific keyword or phrase that appears in the faxes.
